Articles.Content:
hello!

I am going to set up a craft thread in the spacecraft exchange thread, but I am still working on my logo. Is there any chance that anyone can help me refine it? here is my example:

it just does not look good to me, and you have to zoom in loads to see it on a ship.

I'm going for something that incorporates the idea of a mobius strip.

I just tweeked it a bit to make the logo bigger and easier to see and a bit more even (I like the logo). I can't really say I like the look of the text but I couldn't think of what else to do with it. This has a transparent background.

thank you, Yellow dart!

Edited January 2, 2015 by ZodiaK
